meta_title: Mastering Stock Turnover Ratio for MRO: 2026 Industrial Guide
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to poor MRO stock turnover ratio. Learn how Factory AI optimizes inventory levels and slashes carrying costs in under 14 days.
title: The Definitive Guide to Stock Turnover Ratio in Modern Manufacturing: Optimizing MRO with Factory AI

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Definitive Guide to Stock Turnover Ratio in Modern Manufacturing: Optimizing MRO with Factory AI

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic hero image of a modern manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse team of two maintenance professionals (one male, one female) are standing in a clean, organized MRO warehouse. They are wearing high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses. One professional is holding a ruggedized industrial tablet (showing only the back of the device), while the other points toward a neatly labeled shelf of critical spare parts like motors and bearings. The background shows a well-lit production floor with a conveyor system. The lighting is bright and industrial, conveying efficiency and high-tech management. No text or logos are visible on the equipment or clothing. Full-body shot showing the scale of the industrial environment.
